headline: C.H. Robinson: The AI Scare Is An Overreaction (Rating Upgrade)
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide has surged over 70% since last July, outperforming the S&P 500 by a wide margin. Click here to read my latest analysis of CHRW stock.

headline: C.H. Robinson (CHRW) Valuation Check After AI Freight Tech Fears Hit Logistics Stocks
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide (CHRW) shares were hit hard after fresh headlines about AI driven freight technology triggered a broad selloff in logistics stocks, as investors questioned which business models might be most exposed. See our latest analysis for C.H. Robinson Worldwide. That AI driven shock comes after a choppy stretch for C.H. Robinson, with a 12.25% 7 day share price return decline following recent AI headlines, but a 15.31% 90 day share price return and 80.79% 1 year total...
